ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics
ygData.msgSnippet: !!!  That s great of you, but thanks to guildies, I m all blue except for 1 bracer!  I *really* appreciate that offer!  Equipment wise, I think I m golden
ygData.messageBody:
!!! That's great of you, but thanks to guildies, I'm all blue except for 1
bracer! I *really* appreciate that offer! Equipment wise, I think I'm
golden (even instruments...I have MM drums and Lute of Gypsy Princess),
although offhand, I can't even think of what I have in the equip slots that
don't have lambent pieces for them...

On that note, is there anything better than lambent for us? I know there
are singing steel boots (or I think I know...heh), that are supposed to be
better. Is there a whole singing steel suit? Dunno...I kinda like being
all blue! :)

Atonal

-----Original Message-----
From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
Sent: Friday, January 12, 2001 9:52 AM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: [eqbards] Input on Recent digest Topics


My worst leveling period was 34 to 36 for some odd reason. My cleric mate
and I set death records and lost level records til some higher level friends
of ours set us down in Garton's tower in MM and force feed us exp til we got
out of that range. We all started going to Kedge Keep about then too, no one
was there so it was really cool to have bascially your own private dungeon.
Spent from the high 30s to 50 in KK. I believe strongly this was the dungeon
V has alluded to as having the best exp modifier in the game. It better, the
loot completely sucks: just fish aned scales. Rare drops are exactly that in
KK. I do have the sharkskin drum and maybe my luck is bad but we pulled that
spawn routinely for most of the levels we spent in KK and we didn't get it
til things were starting to go green to us there.
The brakes really kick in on leveling above 50. It really goes slow. Right
now, we going to Howling Stones when we can find folks to go. That seems to
move the exp bar better than anything else we've tried.

Lullaby I have used on the last 2 years mainly to crowd control extremely
green stuff. I should put the screenshot I have of me and about 20 froggies
in Upper Guk somewhere. I think our dispell song is completely random about
which buff it takes off and thus I never use it. Clerics get upset if you
strip off your symbol accidently. Twilight is a great song! I use the 'come
hither' part of it as much as I use the mez portion!

Atonal, I'll give you an armor quest! You catch big Bril in a zone with a
bank and I'll give you the 3 or 4 pieces of lambent I have in the bank, if
you want them. I think I have arms, legs, boots, and a bracer at least. It's
just taking up space and I don't know anyone in my circle of friends nutty
enough to start a bard anyway. ;)

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
